DOC.brief_summary: To demonstrate bioequivalence of fesoterodine 4 mg tablets manufactured at Vega Baja, versus Zwickau.
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Of 4 Mg Fesoterodine Extended-Release Tablets (Toviazâ„¢) In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subjects Body Mass Index (BMI) of 17.5 to 30.5 kg/m2; and a total body weight >50 kg (110 lbs). Subjects with evidence or history of clinically significant urologic diseases A positive urine drug screen Pregnant or nursing females; females of childbearing potential who are unwilling or unable to use an acceptable method
